Date: in the original screening it fades to black and the credits start to roll but the music continues. That might sound insignificant to some but without that simple continuity
Text: the ambience of the final scene is rendered impotent. It doesn't ruin the whole story but it is clumsy and it effectively ruins the denouement. "
